chunks.title: Troubleshoot QR Code Issues
chunks.body: Common QR code problems and solutions for scanning, generating, and sharing payment QR codes with NYLA.
chunks.summary_en: Troubleshooting guide for common QR code scanning and generation problems with step-by-step solutions.
chunks.summary_zh: 常见二维码扫描和生成问题的故障排除指南，包含分步解决方案。

steps.details: Increase screen brightness to maximum and ensure the QR code is displayed clearly without glare or reflections.

steps.action: Clean camera lens and improve lighting
steps.details: Clean your device camera lens and ensure good lighting conditions for optimal QR code scanning.
Hold device 6-8 inches from QR code, keep steady hands, and scan straight-on rather than at an angle.
If default camera app fails, try dedicated QR scanner apps or wallet apps with built-in QR scanners.
Go back to NYLAGo, check wallet connection, and generate a fresh QR code with correct network and amount.
Copy the wallet address from NYLAGo and compare it to what the QR scanner detected to ensure accuracy.

pitfalls.issue: QR code too small or pixelated
pitfalls.solution: Zoom in on the QR code display or request a larger version. Avoid screenshots that reduce quality.
Tilt device to avoid glare, use matte screen protector, or scan in different lighting conditions.

pitfalls.issue: Camera won't focus on QR code
pitfalls.solution: Tap screen to focus manually, clean camera lens, or try scanning from different distances.
Regenerate QR code in NYLAGo and verify wallet connection. Always double-check scanned address.

pitfalls.issue: Amount not pre-filled from QR code
pitfalls.solution: Some wallets don't support amount encoding. Manually enter the amount displayed with the QR code.

common_errors.cause: QR code generated without proper wallet connection
common_errors.solution: Reconnect wallet in NYLAGo before generating QR code

common_errors.cause: Scanning wallet on different network than QR code
common_errors.solution: Switch wallet to matching network or regenerate QR for correct network

common_errors.cause: Wallet doesn't have enough balance for transaction + fees
common_errors.solution: Add funds to wallet or reduce transaction amount
